name: Tree Protector (dusho)
description:
Tree Protector

Ludum Dare 50, Theme: Delay the inevitable

Controls: WASD for movement, mouse for targeting and shooting (left mouse button)

Goal: Destroy as many intruders as possible (by throwing nuts)

Tools used:

  • - Unity 2021.1
  • - Visual Studion Community 2017
  • - Blender
  • - paint.net
  • - https://sfxr.me/
